headline: Where We Cry
subhead: As part of a special issue about mental health, The Daily Californian is collecting stories about students crying on and around campus.

sections.text:
For The Daily Californian’s upcoming special issue regarding mental health, we are collecting data to normalize and destigmatize crying in the UC Berkeley population. 
If you feel comfortable, please share a time you cried, where it happened, be it a hidden corner in Dwinelle Hall or in the middle of Memorial Glade, and why — whether happy or sad. This data will be reviewed and used in the interactive graphic below. We appreciate your feedback.
This is an example of a section header
